result.execSummary:
The defendant Bobbie Jean Bonds was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).
  • Exposing Genitals/Pubic Area/Intimate Parts - Child Act as Actor/Close Age of Actor and Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(b).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Restitution ordered paid in full fron bond posted. Remaining bond held by Clerk of Courts. Department of Corrections to monitor any future submissions for out of pocket counseling costs for victim and/or family.

Cts 1 - 3: Court costs paid in full from bond posted.
Pay supervision fees.
  If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, in addition to all other enforcement sanctions available to the court, a civil judgment enforceable by all creditors' remedies shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.
No contact with victim or her family.

Submit to Sex Offender Evaluation and  comply with any treatment deemed appropriate.
Register as a Sex Offender for period of supervision.
Submit to DNA sample by 2/27/16.
COURT WITHHOLDS FINDING ON EXPUNGEMENT - 6 month review hearing set for 8/15/16 at 4:00pm. Agent and defendant to appear in person.

charges.descr: Exposing Genitals/Pubic Area/Intimate Parts - Child Act as Actor/Close Age of Actor and Child
